Name: Akin Vol 2
About the game: Once again, you only have to draw one continuous line. When you draw on a tile, it will change color from orange to blue or from blue to orange. You solve each puzzle, by making all tiles akin. There are 96 puzzles on 'Normal'-mode and 96 puzzles in 'Time'-mode. Each puzzles can have many different solutions. Start with basic puzzles and unlock harder ones. There are also special tiles. The 'Teleport'-tile, teleports the line to another point in the puzzle. The 'Double Use'-tile can be used twice, which is requires to solve some of the puzzles
